channel.title: No response from login server
channel.description:
So I created a server, compiled it, i ran it. And now it's online (at least that's what my Terminal says). Whenever I use MoparScape to log into my server, it simply says "No response from loginserver. Please wait 1 minute and try again."
It's been saying this for about a half hour now. I've never been able to log into my server (I just made it an hour ago) so this is a problem.
Could anyone tell me what's wrong? I changed the port and the server ip. I don't know what to do. :c

item.title: No response from login server
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

set ips on client to 127.0.0.1 or localhost

Read full topic

item.title: No response from login server
item.dc:creator: @CoreyCobain CoreyCobain
item.description:
@CoreyCobain wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:530075”][quote author=CoreyCobain link=topic=648830.msg4362503#msg4362503 date=1379026786]

what server are you using?

not all servers are compatible with the moparscape client.

It’s a PI server.
I think the original source was called “Realm Onwards”.

I really need to know how to play on my server… All this work for nothing. :c
[/quote]
SO, it is my source?

Well, you need to use the client I provided.[/quote]

I’m trying, but i can’t get it to work. :l

Read full topic
